title: The Connections (CRS078)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Jen Kwok first shared on the podcast in February of 2014 about spiritual and personal connections.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jen Kwok, Kevin Allison)
